records.title: Grunt
records.description:
A talk about Grunt task runner where I demonstrated what it is, what are the benefits of using a task runner, how to install and use Grunt and explained the meaning of every step in detail.
I wrote a post about this talk on my blog.

records.title: Behaviour Driven Development with Jasmine
records.description:
A Labcamp is an event starting with a presentation which is then followed by a friendly competition. During the presentation I made a very brief introduction to Test Driven Developement, compared to Behaviour Driven Developement and demonstrated the basics of Jasmine framework. For the competition I prepared a selection of katas and participants were invited to write quality tests for each of the exercise.
You can read more about this Labcamp on my blog.
